title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the dataset, trying to create a new table group does not display the group dialog.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. User should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed and user can define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
